ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Walrus Skin Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for the tags, I m too lazy right now to clean them out. For Xegony Slyde I would say 3-5k is fair at your discount. Just one opinion from a fellow Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for the tags, I'm too lazy right now to clean them out. For Xegony
Slyde I would say 3-5k is fair at your discount. Just one opinion from a
fellow Xegony Bard, with little in the way of facts to support my position
:).

Tzeetch
The Commune - Xegony

--- Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> wrote:


I did some testing on this.  Chant of battle at 51 is 30 str and dex
with a hand drum.<BR>
With Nostolo tamborine it is 37 str and dex<BR>
With Walrus skin drum it is 39 str and dex<BR>
Guess that makes it about even with sharksin drum and on eq prices that is
around 3k.  But for the money, I think it would be cheaper to just
buy your tamborine quest coins and get that.  Better graphic too.<BR>
  Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote: I have a
friend who got one in SG - and is willing to give me a deal on<BR>
discounted "going" rate.  Note to non-Xegony Bards - Xegony
prices tend to<BR>
run on the high side...<BR>
<BR>
I'm probably into gear less than a lot of people - and the drum seems
only<BR>
to be marginally better than my current Nestrolo Tambourine - so I it's
not<BR>
worth it to me to tap myself out (on the one hand) - but I would like
to<BR>
fairly compensate my friend if I take her up on the deal.<BR>
<BR>
She's done some preliminary asking around the server and got a range
of<BR>
9-20K.  The high end sounds ridiculous to me - I can't imagine paying
20K<BR>
for a Selo's Drum which is a lot better (however I think there is a lot
of<BR>
confusion between the Walrus Skin drum and the Drum of the Beast - ie
people<BR>
think the Walrus Skin drum is better than Selo's) And it's probably
very<BR>
rare at the moment since prior to the last patch - basically no one
hunted<BR>
in SG.<BR>
<BR>
Anyway - I wondering what you Xegony folks think a fair (normal<BR>
non-discounted) price range would be for this item.<BR>
<BR>
Thanks<BR>
<BR>
Slyde<BR>
